name: The Lands of Knowledge
description: Enter a sprawling realm of wonder where every path leads to discovery! In The Lands of Knowledge, enchanted regions flourish with lessons in math, science, language, history, art, geography, music, technology, philosophy, and culinary arts. Mysterious magical gates link these diverse domains, inviting young adventurers to solve puzzles and unlock secrets that reveal the magic of learning.

nodes.name: Math Meadow
nodes.description: A bright field where numbers dance and equations grow like wildflowers.

nodes.name: Science Springs
nodes.description: Bubbling with experiments and natural wonders at every corner.

nodes.name: Language Lagoon
nodes.description: A serene waterway filled with words, stories, and playful conversations.

nodes.name: History Highlands
nodes.description: Ancient legends and forgotten civilizations echo among these timeless hills.

nodes.name: Artistry Arbor
nodes.description: A vibrant grove bursting with creativity and colorful masterpieces.

nodes.name: Geography Glades
nodes.description: Winding paths and secret clearings reveal the wonders of our world.

nodes.name: Music Mountains
nodes.description: Melodic peaks and harmonious valleys where nature sings its song.

nodes.name: Technology Terrace
nodes.description: A futuristic plateau buzzing with gadgets, circuits, and innovation.

nodes.name: Philosophy Forest
nodes.description: A mystical woodland where deep thoughts and curious minds wander.

nodes.name: Culinary Cove
nodes.description: A delightful harbor where flavors mix and cooking becomes an art.

nodes.name: Silver Gateway
nodes.description: A shimmering archway cloaked in mystery, linking Science Springs and History Highlands.
nodes.unlockMessage: The Silver Gateway recognizes your Silver Key and slowly melts open, revealing the path ahead!

nodes.name: Golden Gateway
nodes.description: An enchanted portal adorned with numeric runes and word puzzles, bridging Math Meadow and Language Lagoon.
nodes.unlockMessage: Your Golden Key glows brightly as the numeric patterns align, unlocking the path to knowledge!

nodes.name: Crystal Gateway
nodes.description: A mystical gateway sparkling with creative energy, connecting Artistry Arbor to Music Mountains.
nodes.unlockMessage: The Crystal Gateway resonates with your Crystal Key, creating a beautiful melody that opens the passage!

nodes.name: Emerald Gateway
nodes.description: A futuristic portal humming with innovation, linking Technology Terrace and Culinary Cove.
nodes.unlockMessage: The Emerald Key fits perfectly, activating ancient machinery that opens the gateway with a whoosh of energy!
